name: Dinari WALRF
description: The Dinari WALRF dShares token (WALRF.d) represents 1:1 ownership of shares in MegaWatt Lithium & Battery Metals Corp. (WALRF), a company engaged in the acquisition and exploration of mineral resource properties, focusing on battery metals essential for electric vehicles and renewable energy storage. Each WALRF.d token is fully backed by a corresponding WALRF share, securely held in a transparent and auditable treasury. By leveraging blockchain technology, WALRF.d offers investors exposure to the growing battery metals sector with benefits such as 24/7 trading, fractional ownership, instant settlement, and enhanced liquidity.
